data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who are far from you in Roraima. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Roraima, Brazil
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Roraima
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 4 lost neighbors

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 112,526 believers in Roraima, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Roraima, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Yaroame people might believe through him.
Spirit, please defend the 112,526 believers in Roraima against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 112,526 believers in Roraima, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.section_summary:
the state of Roraima, Brazil has a population of 451,200.

We estimate Roraima has 112,526 people who might know Jesus, 292,563 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 46,111 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Roraima to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

location.name: Roraima
location.cities_list: Boa Vista, Santa Elena de Uairén
location.cities_list_w_pop: Boa Vista (235,150), Santa Elena de Uairén (29,795)
